channel.title: Robot
channel.description:
Well after the post of that robot, and the tank of shrogg's. I had an idea to make a robot it's a work in progress;
Note : It's my first model in months :D
Last Update : 4:13pm GMT+12 total time 40-50 mins
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2nqr18p.png[/img]

item.title: Robot
item.dc:creator: @The_Exclusive The Exclusive
item.description:
@The_Exclusive wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:31, topic:380507”][quote author=The Exclusive link=topic=476336.msg3485668#msg3485668 date=1296540678]

[quote author=the wanderer link=topic=476336.msg3485665#msg3485665 date=1296540535]

1.Turn this into a modern dump truck.
2.Animate
3.???
4.Profit

[/quote]One, two,
Buckle my shoe;
Three, four,
Knock at the door;
Five, six,
Pick up sticks;
Seven, eight,
Lay them straight:
Nine, ten,
A big fat hen;
Eleven, twelve,
Dig and delve;
Thirteen, fourteen,
Maids a-courting;
Fifteen, sixteen,
Maids in the kitchen;
Seventeen, eighteen,
Maids a-waiting
Nineteen, twenty,
My plate’s empty.

Whatever the hell your on must be really expensive and illegal.
[/quote]nope only for one reason It’s that im way too young to know anyone that sell’s that stuff im only 12 im a good boy XD

Hi. I’m 12 and what’s this? Also didnt you say you were 14? There’s nothing I hate more than a liar. It really ticks me off to no end. Sorry for getting off topic.[/quote]i think your thinking of CerealKiller[quote=“CerealKiller, post:13, topic:380378”]kool im 14 irl i really dk! lol[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Robot
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

[quote=“shrogg, post:21, topic:380507”]Just asking, but how did you do the tracks?

[EDIT] “It’s ironic, I don’t model anymore yet I comment in the models section >>”
WHAT THE FUCK! you say that and YOU ARE STILL MODELING![/quote]

Well I made a cube and extruded and entruded the areas I wanted to fit together, I then bevelled it slightly

@My Signature, I only just started modelling again so calm down

Read full topic

I like it a lot. You plan on adding some kind of design?

Honestly, umm I haven’t even done a concept yet :\ I dont even know what it will do lol, I should think of that now

Offtopic : I am really proud to see lots of the new modeller’s using primitives and posting the work they are doing

[/quote]I love that combination of words silly billy although I am michael not billy eh oh well[/quote]

Lol ok

item.title: Robot
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:9, topic:380507”]Alright cool I will be harsh as I can, you seem more erm…I don’t know…

First off how would the metal tires grip the track? They look like they would slide off it should be more or less gear style. I am waiting to see how you mount the body base do to how close the stuff looks.

Also you must finish rig and animate this.[/quote]

Yeah I am gonna add the indents to the tracks later on and I will try to animate it and rig it

Read full topic
